summary: TAMARA RECALL    I WAS NEVER CONTACTED BY THE DEALER. I WAS TOLD ABOUT THE RECALL FROM A FRIEND. WHEN I DID CALL MY DEALER , I WAS TOLD I HAD TO WAIT TO RECEIVE NOTICE THAT THE PARTS ARE IN TO RESOLVE THE PROBLEM WHICH I FEEL IS VERY UNSAFE. I WAS NOT OFFERED A LOANER OR RENTAL TO DRIVE WHILE THAI IS IS RESOLVED WHICH ITO ME IS A SAFETY HAZARD BECAUSE NO ONE KNOWS WHEN AN ACCIDENT WILL OCCUR.
